page.title: 10Trust Hall
page.content:
{Shottisham Trust Hall}was beqeathed to the Women's Institute by one of the {Quilter family}some 30 years ago. It was originally three cottages but has now been converted into a small hall.
It is the only hall in the village and is hired out by the WI for various functions.{Whist Drives and Coffee Evenings, which are very well supported by the villagers, are held there to help with the cost of maintenance.There are no grants available and it is an ever increasing struggle to maintain the building.
The elderly hold their{Frienship Club meetings there , as does the{Parish {Council}and it is used as a Polling Station during Elections.
